messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on energy emissions we detected, we believe that one of the station's animals/bots has developed clown level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space being cold, not more than 15 [REDACTED] have swarmed into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our sophisticated probabilistic models, we believe that one of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed security level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Chapel Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Research Initiatives

Cargo: Your station has been chosen for an epidemiological research project. Send us your cargo shuttle to receive your research samples.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space being cold, a horde of rodents have stampeded into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space being cold, a swarm of mice have migrated into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Cap is not dead, the infection can be cured with sugar

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The captain is not dead he is in maintenance somewhere, the infection has a vaccine and is easy to cure with just sugar

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Quit shuttle calling for invalid reasons goofy

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Vault.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Spacepizza Division

Cargo: It looks like a neighbouring station accidentally delivered their pizza to you instead
